OOC:  Kyle, I'm going to have to teach you a lesson little boy.  First of a=
ll, your name isn't Kyle, and I refuse to call you that from now on.  Secon=
d of all, about your intelligence.  Being intelligent is only good in a ver=
y little way.  You can have the highest IQ in all of damned history, yet it=
's still nothing without WISDOM.  You lack wisdom, and therefore your intel=
ligence is a joke.

Second of all, I am not weird if I don't see women as n=
othing more than mere sexual objects.  I don't want to have children or mar=
ry somebody.  I extremely LOVE being alone, and I plan to be alone all of m=
y life.  If I EVER want to have somebody there for me, it might as well be =
the VERY few friends I have.  Let's just say I have a lot less than 5 frien=
ds.  True friends, anyway.  Even if I haven't seen them.  Hehe.  Anyway, if=
 all you think about in a woman is bed, why don't you go watch XPW or somet=
hing.

Pooboy, the way you suggested to Airly wasn't polite, all it display=
ed was ignorance and self-absorbsion.  So get lost.  FEAR THE nWo!

-------=

New World Order
